availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. H. Thompson (Aledo, Illinois, postmaster)

body.p: Aledo, Illinois, postmaster. Virginia native. Married to Caroline M. Hackney Thompson on September 23, 1855. Father of Ida Bell Thompson. Postmaster in Aledo from 1858 to 1861.

bibl.p:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Mercer County, Aledo, p. 198; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994038, Laurel County Marriages, September 23, 1855, p. 1; Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, Mercer County, Illinois,
(accessed via Ancestry.com).
